actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of civil service retirement periods of service performed in nonappropriated funds instrumentalities of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Includes as creditable service for purposes of civil service retirement periods of service performed in nonappropriated fund instrumentalities of the Armed Forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of civil service retirement periods of service performed in nonappropriated funds instrumentalities of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
